description: This PHP script processes incoming UPnP configuration data from a request, updates device settings accordingly, and appears to be focused on managing UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) settings for a device. It includes logic to enable/disable UPnP, set advertisement period and TTL, and enable zero configuration based on provided JSON input.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main execution logic for processing UPnP configuration data from the request.
